name: Moonfall (itch)
description:
Moonfall is set to release on May 20th.  You can wishlist the game on Steam to receive an reminder the day of the release.

Mixing elements from roguelites and turn-based tactical RPGs, Moonfall is a short game about travelling through dangerous wastelands. Manage your squad, recruit new travelers and craft items to reach the Valley where the broken fragments of the Moon once fell.

Features:
  • 6 different classes of travelers with unique abilities. Assemble the most versatile team to survive the dangers of the wastelands.
  • Reorganize your team each turn and make the best use of the various terrain types. Avoid hazards and gather resources to craft makeshift equipment at your Night Camp.
  • Procedural map and level generation: each run will offer a new set of situations and challenges.
  • Origin cities, crafting recipes and codex pages to uncover and collect for the next runs.

Moonfall is designed to take 2h-5h to beat depending on your experience with the same kind of titles.

I hope you will enjoy the game :)
